body_html: Any updates on this? It used to sort of work when uncommenting the relevant line in batch_matmul.cc, but now it often gives an error, specifically Blas SGEMMBatched launch failed. Also performance actually seems worse with it on the GPU than the CPU.
body_text: Any updates on this? It used to sort of work when uncommenting the relevant line in batch_matmul.cc, but now it often gives an error, specifically Blas SGEMMBatched launch failed. Also performance actually seems worse with it on the GPU than the CPU.
body: Any updates on this? It used to sort of work when uncommenting the relevant line in batch_matmul.cc, but now it often gives an error, specifically `Blas SGEMMBatched launch failed`. Also performance actually seems worse with it on the GPU than the CPU.
